narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: El Centro Del Barrio, Inc. is a Clinic/Center, Federally Qualified Health Center (FQHC) provider based in San Antonio, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $116.3M in Medicaid payments across 2.6M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $116.3M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 14,539 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
